taskTitle: Document log retention/rotation and add Golden Loop log creation test

subtasks.description:
Implement: Document log retention/rotation and add Golden Loop log creation test

Document expectations for docs/logs rotation (naming, size, cleanup) and add a test ensuring each loop writes a run log with task/tests/commit info to the correct date folder.
